name: A Certain Magical Virtual-On
summary:
This is a Cyber Troopers Virtual-On crossover game featuring virtualoids based on A Certain Magical Index characters. 
Virtualoids will have a fourth weapon in this game based on the powers of the characters from A Certain Magical Index. 
So far 4 characters and their Virtualoids have been revealed: Index, Kamijo Touma, Accelerator, and Misaka Mikoto
